resources.string: There\'s no Categories for now, Add one!
What is this application, what is its main goal ?

"This app is an helper to remind you of whatever you want to check out later. To help you do that, it let you add categories of things you want to be reminded of, and let you add notes in a simple manner. No labels, no dates, no check in button, no calendar integration, just you and your notes."

"All your notes are tied to the username you put at the launch of the app. You can add a category with the button at the top, for example : \"Series\". And you can add a note inside the category you\'re in, for example : \"The Wire\". With the Google button at left, you can launch in your favorite browser the google search of your note. And with the bin button at the right you delete your note."

"All your notes are stored in local (in your smartphone) and online (in a server). Whenever there is a connection available, all the changes are given to the server. But if there isn\'t, all the changes are stored locally in your smartphone. The next time a connection is available, all the changes made in local are applied in the server."
How my data are used ? Is there any trick ? Are my notes watched ? Why isn\'t there a password ?

"Nothing is stored online apart from your notes. Nothing is used on your smartphone, no ads, no identity check, nothing apart from your notes. And there is no password for two main reasons : - We guaranty no top security for the data stored in the server, and we\'re just small developers that cannot engage themselves on the security of our server. So if a password were to be asked, this is another source of potential loss of password for you, the user. And we don\'t want to be a potential security breach for you. - The notes should not be something critical in terms of personal information, the main reason this app was created is to have a simple manner to add some reminders."
If you consider as personal information, the notes you add in this application, we recommend you to not use this app.
